page.title: 15LOCAL PUBS
page.content:
For your entertainment you could go out for a meal in a pub :
If you lived in Comberton you can go to the Grape Vine Pub or to the Three Horse Shoes :
And if you lived in Toft you can go to the Red Lion. In the Red Lion you can join the rowing club and the darts team.They also organize a Christmas Party for children under eleven. They also organize things during the year. The Three Horse Shoes is owned by Bob and Pat Elderton and the Red Lion is owned by the Shakespears. Outside the Public House they have a play area for the children.It has swings, slides and a large car-park.
